option.name: updatedContent
updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="#FFFFFF" tools:context=".ScanCubeActivity">
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.Guideline android:id="@+id/guideline_top" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" app:layout_constraintGuide_percent="0.06" />
<!-- Back button styled like activity_device_list --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/Back" android:layout_width="100sp" android:layout_height="55sp" android:text="Back" android:textColor="#FFFFFFFF" android:textSize="17sp" app:fontFamily="@font/irish_grover" app:backgroundTint="#D32F2F" app:cornerRadius="16dp" app:strokeColor="#BDBDBD" app:strokeWidth="1dp" android:elevation="6dp" app:rippleColor="#80FFFFFF" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.064" app:layout_constraintVertical_bias="0.024" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintWidth_percent="0.8" />
<!-- Title --> <TextView android:id="@+id/title" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="40sp" android:text="Rubik's Cube #1" android:textColor="#000000" android:textSize="30sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:fontFamily="@font/irish_grover" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/guideline_top" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/subtitle" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4sp" android:text="Connected" android:textColor="#666666" android:textSize="14sp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/title" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<!-- Big square Scan Cube button in the center --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/scanCube" android:layout_width="0sp" android:layout_height="0sp" android:layout_marginTop="24sp" android:text="Scan Cube" android:textColor="#FFFFFFFF" android:textSize="24sp" app:fontFamily="@font/irish_grover" app:backgroundTint="#D32F2F" app:cornerRadius="20sp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/subtitle" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintWidth_percent="0.55" app:layout_constraintDimensionRatio="1:1" />
<!-- Disabled controls below --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnStart" android:layout_width="0sp" android:layout_height="70sp" android:layout_marginTop="24sp" android:text="Start" android:textColor="#FFFFFFFF" android:textSize="24sp" android:enabled="false" app:backgroundTint="#BDBDBD" app:cornerRadius="20sp" app:fontFamily="@font/irish_grover" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/scanCube" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintWidth_percent="0.8" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnStop" android:layout_width="0sp" android:layout_height="70sp" android:layout_marginTop="16sp" android:text="Stop" android:textColor="#FFFFFFFF" android:textSize="24sp" android:enabled="false" app:backgroundTint="#BDBDBD" app:cornerRadius="20sp" app:fontFamily="@font/irish_grover" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/btnStart" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintWidth_percent="0.8" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btnSpeed" android:layout_width="0sp" android:layout_height="70sp" android:layout_marginTop="16sp" android:layout_marginBottom="24sp" android:text="1x" android:textColor="#FFFFFFFF" android:textSize="24sp" android:enabled="false" app:backgroundTint="#3F51B5" app:cornerRadius="20sp" app:fontFamily="@font/irish_grover" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/btnStop" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintWidth_percent="0.8" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
